title: Rules; specific
context: [ยง342F-31] Rules; specific. The director may establish by rule: (1) The control of vehicular noise; and (2) Other specific areas for control of excessive noise, thereby allowing for varying conditions. [L 1989, c 212, pt of ยง3] Case Notes Neither this chapter nor rules promulgated under ยง342-42 for &ldquo;vehicular noise&rdquo; extend to sounds reproduced by an automobile&rsquo;s stereo and regulated under Revised Ordinances of Honolulu ยง41-31.1. 81 H. 156 (App.), 914 P.2d 549.
